projects.name: File Manager Python Library
projects.description: A python library to manage files to write, read, delete, rename and move files and directories with simple commands.

projects.name: Text Editor
projects.description: A simple python text editor with GUI using PyQt5 and designer, allowing users to create, open, edit, and save text files.

projects.name: Whatsapp Memory Cleaner
projects.description: A tool to help users clean up unnecessary media files from their WhatsApp storage, improving devices memory
